fields.name: Powers:
fields.value:
- Spray fire at someone each night, scorching them and all of their visitors.
Passives:
- If a player is scorched twice, attack them.
- You do not know who is scorched.
- If someone is doused by any role that has a douse/ignite mechanic, scorching them will kill them. The death message will appear as yours.
- With the Necronomicon, you will directly attack whoever you target at night.
